articles.author: Beth Mole
articles.title: SC measles outbreak has gone berserk: 124 cases since Friday, 409 quarantined - Ars Technica
articles.description: On Jan. 6, there were 211 cases. The outbreak, which began in October, is now at 434.

articles.title: Starlink reportedly made free in Iran - but protesters are taking huge risks by using it - BBC
articles.description: The satellite technology has become a vital communications lifeline after the government shut down the internet last week.
articles.content:
Reha Kansara and Ghoncheh HabibiazadBBC News and BBC Persian
